name: Project Lapis
description:
In this immersive game, players take on the role of a reckless patron who finds themselves locked up in jail after failing to pay their tavern tab. But the fun is just beginning! To win the game, players must use their wits and quick reflexes to escape the confines of their cell without getting caught or killed. With danger lurking around every corner, this thrilling adventure will have players on the edge of their seats as they navigate through a world of treacherous obstacles and cunning enemies, all while trying to avoid the fate of being trapped behind bars forever. Can you escape the tavern jail and earn your freedom, or will you be doomed to a life of confinement? The choice is yours in this exciting and challenging game.

Known Issues

  • Keys and collectables doesn't spawn
  • Doors do not lock or unlock
  • Enemies will not interact with the player
